item.description: I spoke with NJ Tech Weekly’s Esther Surden on the impact of OPRAmachine

item.title: Response to NJ Law Journal Article
item.description: Responding to an attorney’s commentary about OPRAmachine’s impact on crime victim privacy

item.title: Interview with PrincetonInfo
item.description: I was interviewed by PrincetonInfo about my work modernizing public records with OPRAmachine

item.title: Rozzi Wins Excellence in Local News Award
item.description: Gavin Rozzi wins the 2019 Excellence in Local News Award in the Innovate Local category from NJ News Commons

item.title: OPRAmachine: 1 Year Later
item.description: Reflections on how the site grew from 2017-18

item.title: Interview with Jersey Shore Online Re: Monmouth County OPRAmachine Lawsuit
item.description: Why we’re suing Monmouth County for violating OPRA

item.title: OPRAmachine Webinar at Montclair
item.description: I presented a free webinar at Montclair University on streamlining public records requests

item.title: Video: Defeating redactions on poorly redacted documents
item.description: Using one of my own public records requests as example, I show how you can find out information that was redacted when public officials mess up.

item.title: Interview with AEA-NJ Newsletter
item.description: I was interviewed about my work with OPRA and public records for the August, 2018 edition of the newsletter of the Association of Environmental Authorities of New Jersey, which represents local and county utilities authorities.

item.title: Big upgrades to OC Radio Live
item.description: New channels added to my cloud-based software defined trunked radio scanner.

item.title: OPRAmachine update: The $1000 email metadata & other pushback from government agencies
item.description: I was recently interviewed about some of the legal & technical challenges the OPRAmachine team has encountered while running the site.

item.title: Document Production in Rozzi v. OAG
item.description: State court judge in Trenton orders New Jersey Attorney General’s Office to produce email logs after legal dispute.

item.title: A Conversation With Jeff Epstein and Patrick Duff Re: OPRA & Open Government
item.description: I spoke with Jeff & Patrick about public records research and recent developments.

item.title: Discussing OPRAmachine's Impact With WLFR Radio's Bill Watt
item.description: I was interviewed by WLFR’s Bill Watt for his show Watt’s The Move

item.title: Featured on Rachel Maddow Show
item.description: A story I wrote about the 2016 campaign was featured on MSNBC’s The Rachel Maddow Show.

item.title: Interview with CIO Magazine
item.description: I speak with CIO Magazine about WordPress
